g.text: Can you require ‘Corporate’ Ownership in Intune
Conditional Access actions you have encountered per
Access actions should operate on an opt
Conditional access action is applied by de
ult to each persona in your environment, and
be explicitly excluded from that CA
if they have a valid use case.
